main_definition: Digital Video Discs (DVDs) are a type of optical disc storage media used to store digital data, including movies, software, and other multimedia content.

meanings_and_examples.example: I bought the latest action movie on DVD.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A format of digital data storage
meanings_and_examples.example: My collection includes both CDs and DVDs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical disc used for storing computer files or multimedia content
meanings_and_examples.example: I organized my movie collection by labeling each DVD with its title.
